name: part_011
file: tmp_【3D BIRTHDAY LIVE】ARCANA - Mori Calliope's Birthday Concert! With Many Guests! [YRySeGZNzQ0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope performs 'Ouroboros' with backup dancers.
Mori Calliope addresses the audience in an MC segment, discussing the concert's theme and tarot cards.
Tarot cards flip on screen to reveal the next guest with cinematic sound effects.
Mori introduces the special guest TOOBOE, and they discuss their collaboration and artistic background.

subtitles.original: Collecting all the stories with a joy
subtitles.english: Collecting all the stories with a joy

subtitles.original: And reflecting on the thorns that near destroyed me
subtitles.english: And reflecting on the thorns that near destroyed me

subtitles.original: I sing about a journey's end and now we come upon
subtitles.english: I sing about a journey's end and now we come upon

subtitles.original: Another one, the sun setting earlier than believed
subtitles.english: Another one, the sun setting earlier than believed

subtitles.original: From this point downward I cannot return
subtitles.english: From this point downward I cannot return

subtitles.original: With a final dream I sought, it's so close yet far within my reach
subtitles.english: With a final dream I sought, it's so close yet far within my reach

subtitles.original: Though I'd like it to be known this time it's on my own
subtitles.english: Though I'd like it to be known this time it's on my own

subtitles.original: Release from our confinement, together we'll find it
subtitles.english: Release from our confinement, together we'll find it

subtitles.original: The trail is fraught with perils and maybe all is as it should be
subtitles.english: The trail is fraught with perils and maybe all is as it should be

subtitles.original: I promise I'll still be me
subtitles.english: I promise I'll still be me

subtitles.original: My mistakes somehow made a good story great
subtitles.english: My mistakes somehow made a good story great

subtitles.original: A journey downward toward somewhere new yet familiar
subtitles.english: A journey downward toward somewhere new yet familiar

subtitles.original: I'm learning how to stand for this smile I swore to defend
subtitles.english: I'm learning how to stand for this smile I swore to defend

subtitles.original: Till the end as we further descend then shall we go
subtitles.english: Till the end as we further descend then shall we go

subtitles.original: Swallowed up by what waits below
subtitles.english: Swallowed up by what waits below

subtitles.original: Mina-san! What did you guys think about our performance today?
subtitles.english: Mina-san! What did you guys think about our performance today?

subtitles.original: Oh my gosh, it was so fun!
subtitles.english: Oh my gosh, it was so fun!

subtitles.original: Hey, wait a minute though, it's not over yet, so don't leave, don't leave!
subtitles.english: Hey, wait a minute though, it's not over yet, so don't leave, don't leave!

subtitles.original: Don't run away to go get the limited merch or anything like that.
subtitles.english: Don't run away to go get the limited merch or anything like that.

subtitles.original: It's not time yet, because we still have a little bit more to go.
subtitles.english: It's not time yet, because we still have a little bit more to go.

subtitles.original: You guys are gonna miss the grand finale, so just stay right there!
subtitles.english: You guys are gonna miss the grand finale, so just stay right there!

subtitles.original: But, um, yeah, no, this show was amazing.
subtitles.english: But, um, yeah, no, this show was amazing.

subtitles.original: We didn't have a lot of MCs, but that's because, you know, we were working hard to perform for you guys.
subtitles.english: We didn't have a lot of MCs, but that's because, you know, we were working hard to perform for you guys.

subtitles.original: And look at all these tarot cards that we have here of me and all of my friends together.
subtitles.english: And look at all these tarot cards that we have here of me and all of my friends together.

subtitles.original: You know, I wanted to celebrate Hololive original songs, especially by Mori this time.
subtitles.english: You know, I wanted to celebrate Hololive original songs, especially by Mori this time.

subtitles.original: I'm a big believer in like, "Let's go, Hololive original music!"
subtitles.english: I'm a big believer in like, "Let's go, Hololive original music!"

subtitles.original: And I wanted to celebrate all of that with you guys today by singing some of my favorite songs by me together with my friends.
subtitles.english: And I wanted to celebrate all of that with you guys today by singing some of my favorite songs by me together with my friends.

subtitles.original: And so I hope that you guys were able to enjoy today's show.
subtitles.english: And so I hope that you guys were able to enjoy today's show.

subtitles.original: And take a look at this stage! Isn't the stage amazing?
subtitles.english: And take a look at this stage! Isn't the stage amazing?

subtitles.original: I know that we looked at it a little bit earlier before, but I mean, it's basically like a dream venue for me.
subtitles.english: I know that we looked at it a little bit earlier before, but I mean, it's basically like a dream venue for me.

subtitles.original: So sparkly and beautiful, oh my gosh.
subtitles.english: So sparkly and beautiful, oh my gosh.

subtitles.original: It's been so amazing, and getting to explore all the different tarot cards as well with you guys.
subtitles.english: It's been so amazing, and getting to explore all the different tarot cards as well with you guys.

subtitles.original: Because you know, as you know, "The Arcana is the means by which all is revealed."
subtitles.english: Because you know, as you know, "The Arcana is the means by which all is revealed."

subtitles.original: And so I hope that you guys had some fun getting to kind of like, see my choices of songs,
subtitles.english: And so I hope that you guys had some fun getting to kind of like, see my choices of songs,

subtitles.original: like who I chose to sing in each song and stuff like that.
subtitles.english: like who I chose to sing in each song and stuff like that.

subtitles.original: But we gotta move right along, we gotta move right along.
subtitles.english: But we gotta move right along, we gotta move right along.

subtitles.original: Because, as you may have noticed, a special premiere has showed up on my channel.
subtitles.english: Because, as you may have noticed, a special premiere has showed up on my channel.

subtitles.original: And our last guest might have something to do with that.
subtitles.english: And our last guest might have something to do with that.

subtitles.original: This is a performance I'm very excited about.
subtitles.english: This is a performance I'm very excited about.

subtitles.original: Um, I gotta go change really quickly, but in the meantime, let's go ahead and summon one more person to the stage!
subtitles.english: Um, I gotta go change really quickly, but in the meantime, let's go ahead and summon one more person to the stage!

subtitles.original: Are you guys ready? Without further ado, here we go! よいしょ！
subtitles.english: Are you guys ready? Without further ado, here we go! Here we go!

subtitles.original: 皆さーん、最後のゲストはなんと、TOOBOEさんです！
subtitles.english: Okay, everyone, here's our final guest. It's TOOBOE-san!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします。よろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: Great to be here. Great to be here.

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします。はじめまして、はじめましてです。
subtitles.english: Great to have you! Nice to meet you, yeah.

subtitles.original: はじめまして。見てる方には、そうですね、
subtitles.english: Nice to meet you. I guess this would be my first time greeting

subtitles.original: はじめましての方が多いかなと思います。よろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: most of your viewers? It's a pleasure to be here.

subtitles.original: はい、よろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: And it's a pleasure to have you.

subtitles.original: 実は、あの、TOOBOEさんは、去年のカリオペの
subtitles.english: Believe it or not, TOOBOE-san, you were my

subtitles.original: Spotifyで一番よく聴いてたアーティストだったんですけど。
subtitles.english: most listened to artist on Spotify last year.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます、本当に。
subtitles.english: Thank you so much.

subtitles.original: いえいえ、こちらこそ。ホロライブに入る前ずっとファンですから。
subtitles.english: No, thank you. I've been a fan of yours since before I joined Hololive, even.

subtitles.original: へえ、本当に。
subtitles.english: Really?

subtitles.original: 本当に嬉しいですね。
subtitles.english: I'm so happy to have you here.

subtitles.original: いや、こちらこそ恐縮ですね。
subtitles.english: Please, you flatter me.

subtitles.original: はい。そうですね、あのTOOBOEさんの曲は、本当にかっこいいと思う、マジで。
subtitles.english: I think your songs are really cool. For real.

subtitles.original: なんかメロディのセンスが、やばいです。本当に。
subtitles.english: Your taste in melodies is actually crazy.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: はい。そうですね。そして、負け犬の話がすごく好きだから、リリックもめちゃくちゃ面白いと思うんで、
subtitles.english: And I love a good underdog story, so your lyrics really hit home, too.

subtitles.original: 一緒に曲作りたいなと思いました。
subtitles.english: It really made me want to work on a song with you.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。ぜひ、楽しかったです、本当に。
subtitles.english: Thank you. Working with you was a lot of fun.

subtitles.original: よかった。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: I'm glad it was. Thank you.

subtitles.original: そして、私とTOOBOEさんは、ちょっと共通点があるんだけど、
subtitles.english: What's more, TOOBOE-san and I have something in common.

subtitles.original: 将来の夢は漫画家だった。
subtitles.english: We both dreamed of being manga artists.

subtitles.original: あ、そうですね、そうですね。
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, that's right.

subtitles.original: だから今回アニメーションミュージックビデオを作ろうかなと思いました。
subtitles.english: That's why we thought we should make an animated music video for this one.

subtitles.original: はい。
subtitles.english: Right.

subtitles.original: 今回キャラクターデザインはカリオペとTOOBOEさん。
subtitles.english: TOOBOE-san and I designed the characters.

subtitles.original: はい。
subtitles.english: Right.

subtitles.original: アニメーションはカリオペでした。そうなんですね。
subtitles.english: And I made the animation. Is that so?
